评论详情: Size and colour are same as described. The weight of the pants are light and material is soft.  But the problem is the waistband used by Red Kap is kinda bad nylon like material.. Sewing has sharpe edges which hurt my tummy when I move around. I don’t mind if they increase the price a bit to replace with cotton. C/P value is still very competitive for a daily workwear though.  Overall, it has construction for the lining and the outsourcing work quality are disappointing. I miss the superior quality Red Cap during WWII.

Waistband seam was sewn all the way up the back of the pant, side seams puckered, just looked sloppy. Unfortunately, i washed these for my son before I noticed the terrible construction or I would have returned them.

They are well made, sizing is accurate, quality materials, very comfortable, and feel light.  I use them as work pants in mechanical repair shop so they get dirty, but wash up well. Very pleased, have already purchased more.
They looked great. I was disappointed with a couple details. I will give them another try shortly in case it was just a "my luck" sewing error.
Terrible fabric, stitching...extra fabric on hems aren't even cut off.
item is ok ,wish the inseam was longer, but we have a lot of problems finding the right inseam, we have a high waist line ,other than that their ok.

Two belt loops ripped off at the bottom of the loop, the part attaching to the slacks, not the part sewn into the top of waist band. They can't be worn, its the loop in the front of the pants. It appears the loop fabric is cut too close and the stitching just frayed apart.  I'm just not set up for sewing at this time in my life or it might be an easy repair.  And the fabric has to be ironed if they are to look a nice as other slacks that are non-iron. My husband has only worn them twice, the first time, touched up with an iron, and the second time they needed a full ironing job to look nice. I've never bought Red Kap before, I usually get dressier slacks. I won't get these again. I'm sure there is lots of wear left, if I wanted to mend and iron.

评论概述: Not bad, but the construction seems a bit sloppy
评论详情: I have now worn these pants three times, so I feel more qualified to review. My initial feeling was not positive, as they seemed very hard and starchy (including inside the pockets). They have worn to a much softer feel. The overall fit is not at all bad for me. What is a bit strange is it just feels like the tailoring/construction is a bit off. The seams don't appear straight everywhere, the zipper does not want to move very well.  I don't know if I'd buy them again. Again, color and fit are fine (for me), and I don't think they are going to fall apart soon, but it's like they were sewn by student tailors or something.

评论概述: Who sends customers used pants? Come on, man!
评论详情: I'm usually a huge fan of Red Kap for workwear. Possibly all my work and casual clothes are from this brand. So, I was very disappointed to receive a "new" pair of cotton work pants only to find the tags had been cut off, the pants had obviously been worn, and they were covered with some kind of animal hair. Yuck! Come on, guys. Do better. Be professional.  I gave the product a two-star rating just to support the guys at the factory. The design, material, and construction are excellent and deserve better support from whoever is in charge of distribution.
I like the true color of navy blue, perfect fit (33x30). Use it for work as a Security Officer.
